lego: 当你们一起工作的时候
practice_phrases: 当你和某个人一起工作
I'm so happy when you work together
我很高兴当你们一起工作的时候
That isn't a problem when you work together
那不是问题当你们一起工作的时候
You're like my friend when you work together with them
当你和他们一起工作的时候你像我的朋友
When you work together there are too many ideas
当你们一起工作的时候有太多想法
I believe that when you work together it's very good
我相信当你们一起工作的时候非常好
I think that we should work together
我认为我们应该一起工作
That was a good idea to work together
I believe that when we work together it's very good
我相信当我们一起工作的时候非常好
This work is changing my brain when we work together
当我们一起工作的时候这个工作正在改变我大脑
I'm so happy that you want to work together with them
我很高兴你想和他们一起工作
I think that you will like this idea
我认为你会喜欢这个主意
You will see that this isn't a problem
You will know someone very well when you work together
当你们一起工作的时候你会非常了解一个人
I believe that you will be very happy with this work
我相信你会对这个工作非常高兴
That isn't why you will want to see my friend
那不是为什么你会想见我的朋友
I wanted to know someone who's my friend
我想了解一个是我朋友的人
You're like someone I used to know very well
你像我以前非常了解的某个人
I believe that you know someone who can work together with them
我相信你了解一个可以和他们一起工作的人
When you work together you get to know someone
当你们一起工作的时候你会了解一个人
That isn't why I wanted to know someone in this work
那不是为什么我想在这个工作中了解一个人
I believe that you know someone very well
我相信你非常了解一个人
You're like someone I know very well from this work
你像我从这个工作中非常了解的某个人
When you work together you get to know someone very well
当你们一起工作的时候你会非常了解一个人
I'm so happy that you know someone very well who's my friend
我很高兴你非常了解一个是我朋友的人
That was a surprise because I thought you know someone very well
那是个惊喜因为我认为你非常了解一个人
